description:
The job title is Frontend Engineer Intern, and the description is as follows: 

Project Description: Seeking a Frontend Engineer Intern with a strong design sense to join our team for a 3-month evaluative unpaid internship. Responsibilities include optimizing web pages, maintaining brand consistency, and collaborating with other team members to ensure cohesive web design. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills are a must. Possibility of return offers based on company needs. Skills used includes ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.. The skills required for the job are ReactJS, JavaScript, CSS, Frontend Development, NextJS.
